document.forum_title: Latest Press Releases News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Fitch Rates NYU Hospitals Center's 2016A Revs 'A-'; Affirms Outstanding; Outlook Stable
document.topic_text: Fitch Rates NYU Hospitals Center's 2016A Revs 'A-'; Affirms Outstanding; Outlook Stable Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 37 minutes ago ) NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A-' rating to the expected issuance of the following New York State Dormitory Authority (NY) bonds issued on behalf of NYU Hospitals Center (NYUHC): --$153,000,000 (New York University Hospitals Center) revenue refunding bonds series 2016A. In addition, Fitch affirms the 'A-' rating on approximately $1.3 billion of taxable and non-taxable parity debt issued on behalf of NYUHC currently rated by Fitch. The Rating Outlook is Stable. NYUHC
document.post: Fitch Rates NYU Hospitals Center's 2016A Revs 'A-'; Affirms Outstanding; Outlook Stable Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 37 minutes ago ) NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A-' rating to the expected issuance of the following New York State Dormitory Authority (NY) bonds issued on behalf of NYU Hospitals Center (NYUHC): --$153,000,000 (New York University Hospitals Center) revenue refunding bonds series 2016A. In addition, Fitch affirms the 'A-' rating on approximately $1.3 billion of taxable and non-taxable parity debt issued on behalf of NYUHC currently rated by Fitch. The Rating Outlook is Stable. NYUHC
